---
title: "Installation Instructions"
---

Requires:
```bash
python >= 3.11
```

::: {.panel-tabset}

## Using uv (Super duper fast)
[Get uv](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/getting-started/installation/#pypi)
```{.bash}
uv pip install pyllments
```
## Using pip (Not super duper fast)
```{.bash}
pip install pyllments
```

:::
